description: This file sets up REST API routes for product management using Express.js. It includes route definitions for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting products, and contains Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines GET endpoint for listing products.

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Defines POST endpoint for creating a product.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines GET endpoint for retrieving a product by ID.

methods.name: router.put
methods.description: Defines PUT endpoint for updating a product by ID.

methods.name: router.delete
methods.description: Defines DELETE endpoint for deleting a product by ID.
